Service Leader tracker to observe productivity made on a month to date and year to date basis that was rolled out metro wide Improved Key Performance Indicators all around 19 ADS 11 IPC 32 SPH and decreased ratio of returns to sales from 19 to 14 Facilitate proper communication between all levels of management corporate and store and sales staff Consistently motivate and drive the sales staff
